description.narrative: This activity (General Evidence Products - Research) is a component of Education evidence products reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,986,654. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Educational research. , with the following implementing partners: British Council, DAI Europe, Oxford Policy Management, Peoples Action for Learning Network, Rockefeller Philanthropy Advisors, United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF). The start date is 01-09-2012 and the end date is 30-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
